Name: Scp: Resonance
About the game: The game takes place today, in the multifaceted universe of SCP. The main character is Galen, a simple scientist in Site 13. Recently, Galen graduated from the Faculty of Psychology and was recruited to work with SCP objects. You will be given the story of Galen, who is just starting her career at the SCP Foundation. But is everything so simple here? You have to plunge into the otmasshere of the fund, choose from several options for the development of events and build your own destiny. There is danger at every step. Be on the alert, even friends may turn out to be enemies. This is a visual novel that requires the player to make rational decisions and informed choices. Choose from several options and try to survive. Warning: When you start the game without the language standard of the system installed in Russian, the game will not start.
